events.message: I received the wrong product and would like to request a refund as soon as possible. The item I got isn’t what I ordered.
The issue has been identified as a refund request due to the customer receiving an incorrect product.
Support agent Jane Doe has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello, I’m Jane from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the incorrect product delivery.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received so we can process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I have attached a picture showing the item that arrived, which is different from what I ordered.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a full refund for your order and provide you with a prepaid return label for the incorrect item.
That solution works for me, thank you for the prompt response and for making the refund process easy.
The refund has been successfully processed. You will see the amount credited back to your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
We are following up to confirm that you have received your refund and everything is in order. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since there have been no further issues reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for choosing our service and we hope to assist you again in the future.
